Real Time Predictions at a Stop

Get real time arrival prediction for a specific stop ID

get_realtime_predictions_for_stop(operator_id, stop_id)

Arguments

operator_id

ID of transit agency
stop_id

StopCode referring to a stop

Value

Single row DataFrame with prediction for the specific stop

Examples

get_realtime_predictions_for_stop(operator_id='AC', stop_id=53326)
